Staff Picks

Helloooo Wolf IQ! I'm Harvey the hound, your host for this special Halloween edition of Staff Picks (or should that be HalloWOOn?).

There's no need to be scared this spooky season - I've sniffed out the best solutions to make your customers' tails wag (and boost your profits). Let's go walkies and take a look at them, shall we?

Harvey
Woo

Stripe

Does your checkout need a makeover? Stripe has you covered, with a better-than-ever experience to boost revenue by up to 11.9%.

Attract new customers when you accept secure payments with credit and debit cards, buy now, pay later, and local payment methods in 135+ currencies.
Get the new checkout

Product Bundles

Bundling products brings a lot of advantages. You can introduce shoppers to complementary items they may have missed. They could also create pick-and-mix boxes at a discount or build a custom product from parts.

It's the smart way to grow your store's average order value!
Bundle up for more sales

Smart Coupons

Looking to keep customers coming back for more? Offering discounts, gift cards, and buy one, get one free deals is a proven tactic to get them to sit and stay.

There's an all-in-one solution for this. Shake paws with Smart Coupons, the most flexible way to set up simple (or more advanced) discounting rules.
Make more money with coupons

Facebook for WooCommerce

Reach more social shoppers

CRM Integation for Zoho

Make my store more efficient

eMart

Reboot my look and feel
